text: The Pietà is a statue by Michelangelo. It is now in the first temple on the right of Saint Peter's Basilica in the Vatican City. == References == ==Related pages== The following are other statues by Michelangelo: * David * Moses Category:Statues Category:Art by Michelangelo Category:15th-century works Category:15th century in art
title: Pietà (Michelangelo)
